mainText:
In 1986, I wrote my thesis on a Mac and printed it on a Mac laser printer. As
far as I know I was the first one at Cornell to do so. It caused quite a
ruckus.  That machine taught me that good computers made you feel smart and
empowered. They were tools that enabled greatness. I type this note on my
brand new Macbook Pro.  I just received it yesterday.

Thank you Steve.  Thank you for making machines that were not merely
functional.  Thank you for making machines that featured stunning usability.
The tools of greatness.

Godspeed sir. You will be missed.
author: Doug
